original_title: Sri Lanka match schedule for ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 in India
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Following Sri Lanka's qualification for the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 to be held in India in October/November, the island nation's preliminary round matches are as follows:
October 21. Qualifier 2 (Zimbabwe/Scotland/Netherlands) v Sri Lanka at Lucknow
Each team plays 9 matches. The top four teams will qualify for the semifinals.
